mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_NO, U.PW, U.ARTIST, U.NAME, U.GENDER, U.EMAIL, U.MOBILE, U.BIRTHYEAR, U.BIRTHDAY, U.POSTCODE, U.ROAD_ADDRESS, U.JIBUN_ADDRESS, U.DETAIL_ADDRESS, U.EXTRA_ADDRESS, U.AGREE_CODE, U.SNS_TYPE, U.JOIN_DATE FROM USERS U LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCESS_LOG A ON U.EMAIL = A.EMAIL WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), A.LOGIN_DATE) >= 335 OR (DATEDIFF(NOW(), U.JOIN_DATE) >= 335 AND A.LOGIN_DATE IS NULL)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SLEEP_USERS(USER_NO, PW, ARTIST, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE, SLEEP_DATE) (SELECT U.USER_NO, U.PW, U.ARTIST, U.NAME, U.GENDER, U.EMAIL, U.MOBILE, U.BIRTHYEAR, U.BIRTHDAY, U.POSTCODE, U.ROAD_ADDRESS, U.JIBUN_ADDRESS, U.DETAIL_ADDRESS, U.EXTRA_ADDRESS, U.AGREE_CODE, U.SNS_TYPE, U.JOIN_DATE, NOW() FROM USERS U LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCESS_LOG A ON U.EMAIL = A.EMAIL WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), A.LOGIN_DATE) >= 365 OR (DATEDIFF(NOW(), U.JOIN_DATE) >= 365 AND A.LOGIN_DATE IS NULL))
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM USERS WHERE EMAIL IN (SELECT EMAIL FROM (SELECT U.EMAIL FROM USERS U LEFT OUTER JOIN ACCESS_LOG A ON U.EMAIL = A.EMAIL WHERE DATEDIFF(NOW(), A.LOGIN_DATE) >= 365 OR (DATEDIFF(NOW(), U.JOIN_DATE) >= 365 AND A.LOGIN_DATE IS NULL)) AS AC)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS(USER_NO, PW, ARTIST, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE) (SELECT USER_NO, PW, ARTIST, NAME, GENDER, EMAIL, MOBILE, BIRTHYEAR, BIRTHDAY, POSTCODE, ROAD_ADDRESS, JIBUN_ADDRESS, DETAIL_ADDRESS, EXTRA_ADDRESS, AGREE_CODE, SNS_TYPE, JOIN_DATE FROM SLEEP_USERS WHERE EMAIL = #{email})
